# World Environment Day 2023

URL: http://www.unesco.agh.edu.pl/aktualnosci/world-environment-day-2023/
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:39:58

World Environment Day 2023
June 5 each year has been designated by the United Nations (1972,  Stockholm Conference on the Human Environment) as World Environment Day. 

The purpose of World Environment Day is to draw attention to the impact  of environmental protection and health on human well-being and economic  development around the world.
